title: Vinicius Rocha | Front-end engineer
name: Vinicius Rocha
description: Front-end engineer specialized in building rich experiences on the web. I'm available for full-time and freelancing work, although most of my career is filled with front-end jobs, I'm open to work as a full-stack engineer.

about.title: About
about.description:
I've been helping small clients, startups and large companies build websites and web applications since 2016. Over these years, I've been fortunate to work alongside amazing people, with whom I have faced many challenges.

My focus is the development of robust applications by writing reusable, readable and tested code. These are some of the tools I use to accomplish that:
